Title: Mickey's House of Villains
Director: Jamie Mitchell, Rick Calabash, Tony Craig, Roberts Gannaway, Burt Gillett, Jack Hannah, Jack King, Mike Moon
Writer: Thomas Hart, Kevin Campbell, Thomas Hart, Elizabeth Stonecipher, Roberts Gannaway, Henry Gilroy, Jymn Magon, Roberts Gannaway, Robin Kingsland
Actors: Wayne Allwine, Tony Anselmo, Jeff Bennett, Susanne Blakeslee
Plot: The villains from the popular animated Disney films are gathered at the House of Mouse with plans to take over. Soon, the villains take over the house and kick out Mickey, Donald and Goofy....
